content: > join the skeinwalker fall kal oct 20th to nov 20th > > knit a skeinwalker pattern in good company > >**skeinwalker is hosting a kal from october 20th to november 20th 2025 ** > > whether you re trying a skeinwalker pattern for the first time or you re a longtime knitter whether you choose a quick cowl or an ambitious shawl you re welcome bring your needles your enthusiasm and your sense of adventure and let s knit together > > you can **join the skeinwalker fall kal with any skeinwalker pattern** > come and check out skeinwalker yarns they are available for purchase on payhip crystalline waters stretch between emerald islands sheltered lagoons hide their colorful waters like jewels waiting for the light the turquoise depths shift from aquamarine to deeper teal creating a living canvas that changes with each passing cloud seabirds trace graceful arcs through salt-tinged air hopping effortlessly from island to island the lagunîs cowl captures this turquoise journey lace panels mirror bird wings in flight while diamond-shaped motifs echo the view of lagoons from above generous yarn-overs create the airy lightness of ocean breezes the lace flows and merges like converging currents wrap yourself in the serenity of protected waters and let lagunîs transport you to that perfect moment between sea and sky the name lagunîs is a word play that weaves together lagoon island and sea while the distinctive circumflex accent over the î pays homage to the french word île island for best effect use a smooth round yarn with reasonable stitch definition yarn weights ranging from fingering to aran would be suitable as for colorways i would recommend solid semi-solid speckled or gradient single skein or gradient set yarns do you like the lagunîs cowl you might like those patterns too the éolia /patterns/library/eolia scarf / stole and the glasmålning /patterns/library/glasmalning cowl for endless fun with flowy lace with airy yarn-overs check them out **yarn** malabrigo rios worsted 100% merino wool 192 meters / 210 yards per 100 grams 1 skein sample uses 90 grams in color 413 ankara green alternative yarn skeinwalker yarns interstellar dk 100% stockinette stitch unblocked 12 5 stitches and 20 5 row = 10 cm / 4 inches in stitch pattern b island hopping blocked note obtaining the gauge given is not crucial but will affect the finished size and the yardage needed **notions** stitch markers 1 in color a beginning-of-round marker 5 in color b optional tapestry needle blocking pins blocking wires optional **size** one easily customizable
